restructureit.qualitymeasurement.processors

Class MessagingCalculator

  • java.lang.Object
    • spoon.processing.AbstractProcessor<spoon.reflect.declaration.CtClass<?>>
      • restructureit.qualitymeasurement.processors.MessagingCalculator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    spoon.processing.FactoryAccessor, spoon.processing.Processor<spoon.reflect.declaration.CtClass<?>>

    public class MessagingCalculator
extends spoon.processing.AbstractProcessor<spoon.reflect.declaration.CtClass<?>>
    Calculates the average count of the number of public methods in a class. Also known as Class Interface Size.

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      Average class interface size in input project.
